channel.title: LivingFree Server: Be part of a growing, tight-knit community!
channel.description:
[center][b][font=comic sans ms][size=2em]-The Living Free Server- IP:173.17.84.192[/size][/font][/b] [/center]
Introducing the all-new LivingFree server! We are a VERY new cracked server, run by experienced server admins, and we are always welcoming new players! Our rules are very basic: Please speak English. No griefing, nor stealing. Respect the admins and your fellow players. Don't excessively breed animals. And that's it! :D Our plug-ins are: Residence CommandsEX PermissionsEX BOSEconomy Carz Pitfall Lift DynamicShop FatGiants
[size=14pt]The LivingFree server is all about adding what single player Minecraft has lacked: community! When playing on LFserver, you could easily find yourself playing for hours, enjoying the good company! So give us a try, and help us build up to be a greater server![/size]
